category.name: Product Structure.Appearance Configuration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: APPR_allow_separate_spatial_processing
preference.preference_description: When set to "true", specifies that spatial cache processing for Appearances will be done in a separate update package (in a separate appearance updater process). A value of "false" means that spatial cache processing will occur in the same updater process as the rest of the appearance processing.
